basics.name: Lucas Facundo Palacios
basics.label: Front-end Developer.
basics.summary: I live in Rosario, Argentina, and have over two years of experience in front-end development. I worked at Ecloud, participating in several projects where I implemented front-end development tasks based on designs created by the UX/UI team. During this time, I used technologies such as Vue.js, TypeScript, and Sass, always focusing on creating efficient and visually appealing user interfaces that provide an optimal user experience. I am currently working full-time at FullMindTech as both a Project Manager and Front-End Developer, where I coordinate team projects, manage timelines, and contribute to front-end tasks using React, JavaScript, and CSS. Additionally, I am studying for a Technical Degree in Artificial Intelligence, expanding my knowledge in emerging technologies and intelligent systems

work.name: Fullmindtech
work.summary: As a Project Manager, I coordinate and organize the team to make sure each project runs smoothly from start to finish. I take care of task planning, communication between clients and developers, and keep everything aligned with our goals. My focus is on maintaining an efficient workflow and delivering high-quality results on time.

work.name: Fullmindtech
work.summary: I worked on freelance projects with Fullmindtech team, performing front-end tasks and creating interactive interfaces using technologies such as React, JavaScript, and CSS.

work.name: Sirc Iluminación & Electricidad
work.summary: I was in charge of carrying out the project to improve the website and social networks. Managed WordPress and Figma for web modifications, and coordinated advertising and events.

work.name: Ecloud
work.summary: Development of new features, support for different projects, creation of interactive and attractive user interfaces using technologies such as Nuxt.js, TypeScript, CSS.

work.name: RWS
work.summary: Translation control for implementation. Bug fixing and implementation.

courses: Python, Sql server, Bash, AI, Machine Learning, Deep Learning, Data Science, Linux

projects.name: Bash Project
projects.description: A Bash automation project focused on improving workflow efficiency through custom scripts. This project allowed me to strengthen my skills in scripting, process automation, and system management using Bash.

projects.name: IRT
projects.description: IRT Medicina Laboral Website. This is one of the projects in which I have been part of Ecloud. In this project, I used technologies such as Vue.js, Nuxt, TypeScript, and SASS.

projects.name: Banco Municipal de Rosario
projects.description: Official website of the Banco Municipal de Rosario. In this project, I used technologies such as Vue.js, Nuxt, TypeScript, and SASS.

projects.name: Buply
projects.description: Website to inform about a recyclable materials collection project to gain benefits, protect the environment, and create useful household products with these materials. I used technologies such as Vue.js, Nuxt, TypeScript, and SASS.

projects.name: Games For Gamers
projects.description: Website with information about video games and platforms. I completed this project as my final project when I studied at CoderHouse. In this project, I used technologies such as HTML, JavaScript, and CSS.

projects.name: MopEr
projects.description: Project for two Mechanical Engineers. I am working on a website for a business that provides Mechanical Engineering services related to 3D parts design and drafting. In this project, I am using technologies such as React, Next.js, TypeScript, Tailwind CSS.

projects.name: Goals List
projects.description: Project in React Native that I completed while taking a course on this technology.
